introduction: SYNOPSISAt the end of WWII, Japan seizes a Buddhist temple bell with a 1300-year-old history for its metal. That day, Jong-du's father went to the Buddhist temple because his elderly mother was near death. Jong-du's father wanted to ring the bell to wish his mother safe passage into Buddhist paradise. But instead, Jong-du's father meets death at the hands of the Japanese. To pay respects to his grandmother and father, Jong-du tries to cast a new bell. Due to his excessive behavior, Jong-du is sent away from the temple. At this time, Suk-hi, an art student, has come to the temple for a rest. She falls in love with Jong-du for his passion. Suk-hi dumps her wealthy fiancee and moves in with Jong-du. In order to support themselves, Suk-hi, the tinker wife, searches for copper to make a new temple bell. Then a rich businessman gives them financial support. As the temple bell is finished, Jong-du throws himself into a fire, heading towards Buddhist paradise while Suk-hi shaves her head and becomes a Buddhist nun.故事随着太平洋战争的结束钟声，1300年历史铁器剥夺了日本。父亲节刚刚来接种疫苗的种类送奶奶谁在结束生命的天堂被日军杀害。接种疫苗是从部分由于解除钟铸造的祖母和父亲的过度行动驱逐。美术来到度假胜地也gaeamsa苏珊是违背接种的热情放弃了富裕的未婚夫住在一起接种。苏珊飘扬疯狂地节省铜谋生的小叮当她。随后，汉出现了很多钱，因为老板是maethyeo钟给资金支持佩服接种jinsildoem和热情。Doeja钟完成接种扔苏珊天堂为首的身体剃光并起火修女自己。
